location: Hankou Street Section 2, Wanhua District - near Beimen MRT (406m) and Ximen MRT (525m)
notes: 2BR/1LR/1BA apartment on 12th floor of 15-story elevator building. Move-in ready with appliances (fridge, washer, AC, water heater) and furniture included. Cooking and pets allowed. Has balcony - verify railing safety for baby. Excellent transit access but Ximen area can be busy/noisy. Management fee NT$3000/month extra. Unable to assess modern condition or baby safety details without photos.
